title: 97/582/EC: Commission Decision of 28 July 1997 amending Decision 91/516/EEC establishing a list of ingredients whose use is prohibited in compound feeding stuffs (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 28 July 1997 amending Decision 91/516/EEC establishing a list of ingredients whose use is prohibited in compound feeding stuffs (Text with EEA relevance) (97/582/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Decision 91/516/EEC is hereby amended in accordance with the Annex hereto.

The provisions laid down in the Annex shall apply without prejudice to Decision 94/381/EEC and to the provisions adopted by Member States as permitted by Article 1 (2) of Council Directive 90/667/EEC.
This Decision shall apply with effect from 1 December 1997.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:

For the Commission

ANNEX
The following point is hereby added:
'9. Protein derived from mammalian tissue as an ingredient in compound feeding stuffs for ruminants, excluding:
- milk and milk products,
- gelatin,
- amino acids obtained from hides and skins by a process which involves exposure of the material to a pH of 1 to 2 followed by a pH of >11 followed by heat treatment at 140 Â°C for 30 minutes at 3 bar,
- dicalcium phosphate derived from defatted bones, and
- dried plasma and other blood products.`
